Get more from Camden

Find relevant services, support and things to do.

  • Starting school

    Get help and support for you and your child, apply for a new school place, find term dates and school travel.

  • Moving into Camden

    Check off what you need to do when you move into Camden, and what to do if you need support.

  • Making the most of Summer

    Find out what’s happening in Camden, host a street party, or get support over the summer holidays.

  • Starting school

    Get help and support for you and your child, apply for a new school place, find term dates and school travel.
